CustomField.formula: IF(RecordTypeId = "012i0000000tEhF", "External Customer", IF(RecordTypeId = "012i0000001NRzm", "LDCCR", IF(RecordTypeId = "012i0000001N8pB", "HL Account", IF(RecordTypeId = "0123F000000rhOU", "Intercompany Customer", IF(RecordTypeId = "012i0000000tEhA", "External Customer", NULL)))))
CustomField.label: ERP Account Description
